item.title: Build a Windows 10 image with Packer using VMware Workstation
item.description: Most of the time I use Packer against a VMware vSphere and Microsoft Azure environment. But sometimes itâ€™s useful to use VMware Workstation for local testing purposes. For building Windows 10 images with Packer and using VMware Workstation there is not much information available. In this blog post, I show how to build a Windows 10 image with Packer and VMware Workstation.
